extDescription.message: This extension releases the memory of inactive tabs after a specified time.

keybind.description: the string of buttons in the options page

history.description: the string of buttons in the options page

session_history.description: the string of buttons in the options page

change_history.description: the string of buttons in the options page

information.description: the string of buttons in the options page

operate_settings.description: the string of buttons in the options page

setTimerTitle.message: The duration to unload inactive tabs

switch_not_release.message: Switch to temporarily exclusion purge or restore
switch_not_release.description: the menu in the options page

no_release.description: an option menu name in author

explanation.message: Please keep in mind the following when using this extension:
explanation.description: Description of the used Release Page

explanation_problem1.message: If this extension become invalid(When this extension is updated etc), the purged tabs will close.
explanation_problem1.description: Explanation of the problem about 'the inside of expanded function'

explanation_problem2.message: You can't sync a purged tab use Google Sync with your other devices.
explanation_problem2.description: Description of problem related to the specified 'in the extension' and use file

explanation_solution.message: Use the session history in order to restore the closed tabs.
explanation_solution.description: Solution to when occured about the problem in this extension

remaiming_memory.message: If remaining RAM is less than this, tabs purges automatically
remaiming_memory.description: another option in the options menu

max_history.message: Days to keep history of purged URLs
max_history.description: another option in the options menu

max_sessions.message: The number of sessions to hold
max_sessions.description: another option in the options menu

operateTitle.description: an option title on the option page

operateSyncTitle.description: an option title on the option page

getSettings.description: an option title on the option page

exclude_url.message: Exclude URLs (Regular expression and Partial Match)

keybind_exclude_url.message: Exclude URLs on Keybinds (Regular expression and Partial Match)

if_restore_session_message.message: Click here if you want to restore the closed tabs at the time of the update.
if_restore_session_message.description: The message of recommendation of the restore session.

wantToOperateMessage.message: If you want to operate date, please, you are selecting the date.
wantToOperateMessage.description: The message when a user doesn't select saved session.

purging_all_tabs_except_active.message: Than set value more have opened tabs are purged except active tabs
purging_all_tabs_except_active.description: Purging all tabs except for the active tab.

interval_timing.message: The current session and automatic purging process are interval to check

new_tab_opens_with_purged_tab.message: New tab opens with purged tab.

specification.description: A item in information of option page.

spec1.message: Each tab is setting setInterval. If come specified unload time, The extension to judge run unload or not.

spec2.message: If a tab become active, its tab and previous tab are resetting time.

spec3.message: If to unload a tab, the extension load the empty page, and purge memory.

spec4.message: If the current tab contains a exclusion list, the icon of extension is changed.

spec5.message: Display the number of tabs that are currently released to the icon of the extension.

spec_icon.message: Are not included in the exclusion list of all.
spec_icon.description: A explanation in spec4 of specification.

spec_icon_use.message: Matched the exclusion list of specified the users.
spec_icon_use.description: A explanation in spec4 of specification.

spec_icon_extension.message: Matched the exclusion list which is fixed within the extension.
spec_icon_extension.description: A explanation in spec4 of specification.

spec_icon_temp.description: A explanation in spec4 of specification.

spec_icon_with_keybind.message: Matched the exclusion list of key bindings.
spec_icon_with_keybind.description: A explanation in spec4 of specification.

spec_icon_use_with_keybind.message: Matched the exclusion list of specified the users and the exclusion list of key bindings.
spec_icon_use_with_keybind.description: A explanation in spec4 of specification.

spec_icon_extension_with_keybind.message: Matched the exclusion list which is fixed within the extension and the exclusion list of key bindings.
spec_icon_extension_with_keybind.description: A explanation in spec4 of specification.

spec_icon_temp_with_keybind.message: Matched the temporary exclusion list and the exclusion list of key bindings.
spec_icon_temp_with_keybind.description: A explanation in spec4 of specification.

warning.description: A item in information of option page.

warn1.message: When the extension was updated or disabled, Google Chrome will close purged tabs. In that case, the user is able to restore previous session from the session history in the option page.
warn1.description: A explanation in warning of the option page.

feedback.description: A item in information of option page.

feedback_explanation.message: A bug report of this extension, and question, feature suggestions are from here.

infomation_other.description: A item in information of option page.

source_code.description: A item in other of information of option page.

switchTimer.message: The purging timer to enable or disable.
switchTimer.description: The menu item on the right click popup menu.

add_current_tab_exclude_list.message: Add the url of the current tab to the exclusion lists.
add_current_tab_exclude_list.description: The menu item on the right click popup menu.

exclude_dialog_mes1.message: Tab Memory Purge won't run on any page matching:
exclude_dialog_mes1.description: the message in the exclusion dialog of content scripts.

exclude_dialog_mes2.message: The actual adding string deletes asterisk and the slash of the last.
exclude_dialog_mes2.description: the message in the exclusion dialog of content scripts.

exclude_dialog_mes3.message: You can slide below for to change the pattern of the url.
exclude_dialog_mes3.description: the message in the exclusion dialog of content scripts.

exclude_dialog_add_to_temp_exclude_list.description: the button in the exclusion dialog of content scripts.

regex.description: Item of Regular expression validation tool

regex_any_except.message: Any single character except a, b, or c.
